title: Florida Gulf Coast Waterfront Oasis with Daily Dining Credit & Adults-Only Rooftop Pool
description:
Soak up the sun-drenched Florida charms of this waterfront retreat, ideally perched along the Gulf Coast between Sarasota and Fort Myers. Offering a blend of coastal luxury and modern comforts, here you can choose between family-friendly fun at the sprawling ground-level pool, or adults-only relaxation at the rooftop Level Blue, where you can escape the noise with endless vistas and poolside tipples.

For further indulgence, enjoy concept dining at Harbor Yards, savour the finest steaks and seafood grills at Maury's, relish coastal Italian fare at Stretto and kick back with tropical drinks at Half-Cracked, the resort's tiki shack. Beyond the resort, perfect your swing at the nearby Aileron Golf Club, go on chartered excursions, and discover the region's golden sands.
offer_address: 5500 Sunseeker Way, Charlotte Harbor, Florida 33980, United States

title: Boutique Orlando Florida Stay with Daily Breakfast, Heated Pool & Room Upgrade
description: Just a short stroll from Park Avenue, relish in the stylish boutique feel of The Alfond Inn at Rollins College, Winter Park's premier hotel. Blending warm hospitality with local care, the hotel donates all profits towards Rollins College Scholarships. Boasting 183 rooms, two pools, two fitness centres, and an onsite cafe, the hotel’s welcoming and modern interior invites you to set your own pace. Take advantage of prime location with a quick trip downtown, or stay in and dine on locally sourced, Southern fare with a modern twist at Hamilton’s Kitchen.
location_description: The Alfond Inn at Rollins College
offer_address: 300 E New England Avenue, Winter Park, Florida 32789, United States

vendor_name: Winslow's Bungalows - Key West Historic Inns
title: Boutique Florida Luxury in Old Key West with Three Pools
description: For Floridian luxury at its finest, stretch out by the pool at Kimpton Winslow's Bungalows, an IHG Hotel, a tropical oasis tucked in the heart of Old Key West. This set of bohemian bungalows offers coastal-inspired modern spaces intended for relaxation and enjoyment first and foremost. Make your way through lush gardens and swaying palms to one of three sparkling outdoor pools for a refreshing dip or a waterside cocktail, or head to the open-air pavilion for a tasty snack.
location_description: Kimpton Winslow's Bungalows, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 725 Truman Avenue, Key West, Florida 33040, United States

title: Florida Iconic Island Resort Village with Six Restaurants & Three Swimming Pools
description: Chase that island-living lifestyle along Florida's west coast on the secluded 130-hectare nature retreat of Captiva Island with a stay at South Seas Island Resort. Spend long, sun-filled days paddling in the ocean, or make the most of your time in this iconic resort village by enjoying splashy fun in any of the three pools, taking to the water on a kayak or parasail, playing a match on the tennis court, or wining and dining across the six onsite restaurants. When you're not enjoying fun in the sun, relax at the Kay Casperson Spa with a massage.
offer_address: 5400 Plantation Road, Captiva, Florida 33924, United States

title: Glamorous Amelia Island Beachfront Escape near Florida with Ten Onsite Restaurants & Nature-Inspired Spa
description:
Discover oceanfront relaxation at this sprawling oasis, tucked away in Florida's famed Fernandina Beach on the vibrant Amelia Island.  This stunning resort is home to a private beach, a nature-inspired spa, three lush golf courses, tennis courts and tempts with as many as ten onsite restaurants serving prime steaks, fresh seafood, surf-inspired pizzas and Floribbean delights.

Overlooking the turquoise waters of the Atltanic Ocean, the expansive resort offers an idyllic tropical retreat, perfect for both family fun as well rekindling the romance. Dive into Northeast Florida's largest poolscape, enjoy the nautical-themed splash park, unwind in the adults-only infinity pool, and savor artisanal tacos and ice-cool drinks. With endless activities like tennis, watersports, trendy shopping, and beach exploration, get ready for an island adventure!
offer_address: 39 Beach Lagoon Road, Fernandina Beach, Florida 32034, United States

title: Florida Key West Oceanfront Paradise with Three Swimming Pools
description: Resting on Key West's palm-fringed shores and overlooking the bold blue of the Atlantic Ocean is Southernmost Beach Resort, an island-style hideaway tucked away on the iconic Duval Street. When you're not exploring the nearby shopping, nightlife and restaurants in the Old Town, spend time splashing in one of three heated swimming pools, enjoy a massage at the Southernmost Spa and savour the flavours of the Caribbean or a poolside key lime colada at the restaurant and bars.
offer_address: 1319 Duval Street, Naval Air Station Key West, Florida 33040, United States

title: Florida Oceanfront Retreat with Luxury Day Spa, Outdoor Swimming Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
A sophisticated Floridian sojourn awaits at this lavish seaside retreat, located on the shores of the pristine Atlantic Beach. One Ocean Resort & Spa claims a prime position just steps from the sparkling shoreline and the vibrant Beaches Town Centre, brimming with eclectic boutiques, art galleries, and gourmet dining.

Enjoy the freshest seafood at the upscale Azurea restaurant, or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the world-class spa. Explore the nearby Kathryn Abbey Hanna Park, renowned for its scenic trails and freshwater lake, or take a short drive to Jacksonville for a wealth of cultural attractions. The resort also offers a state-of-the-art fitness centre and an outdoor pool overlooking the Atlantic Ocean.
offer_address: 1 Ocean Blvd, Atlantic Beach, Florida, United States, 32233

title: Tropical Key West Florida Escape with Outdoor Pool
description: Escape to an oasis of heritage luxury at Kimpton Key West, a captivating hotel that seamlessly blends modern sophistication with the laid-back charm of Key West. Immerse yourself in the vibrant ambience of Duval Street, or relax by the sparkling pool amidst lush tropical gardens while sipping a drink from the bar. Set in a prime location, this breezy hotel promises an unforgettable retreat in paradise.
location_description: Kimpton Lighthouse Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 902 Whitehead Street, Key West, Florida 33040, United States

title: Tropical Miami Retreat in the Heart of Coconut Grove with Rooftop Pool & Bar Area Overlooking the Ocean
description: Experience the dreamy and electric nature of Miami’s Coconut Grove with a five-star tropical escape, complete with high-end dining and sophisticated garden-centric design. With a rooftop bar and pool, this one-of-a-kind escape is perfectly placed to admire the South Florida sunset before venturing into the magical Miami streets. Enjoy an afternoon tipple at Sipsip Calypso Rum Bar boasting island-inspired refreshments, before a sizzling bite Mayfair Grill restaurant.
offer_address: 3000 Florida Avenue, Miami, Florida 33133, USA

title: Florida Captiva Island Bayside Resort with Onsite Dining, Pools & Golf Course
description:
Unwind in tropical paradise at this inviting bayside retreat, located on a 330-acre wildlife preserve on Florida's Captiva Island. Just a stone's throw from the pristine white sands of the Gulf of Mexico, this beachfront oasis offers a wealth of activities for adventure and nature lovers alike, from water sports and fishing to cycling and nature walks.

Dine on fresh seafood at Redfish Grill, or enjoy a casual meal at the poolside Scoops and Slices. Explore the island's charming boutiques and art galleries, or take a short drive to the J.N. "Ding" Darling National Wildlife Refuge. With a shiny spa, waterpark and golf course onsite, this is the perfect escape for families of all sizes.
offer_address: 5400 Plantation Road, Captiva, Florida 33924, United States

title: Secluded Florida Keys Island Resort with Five Swimming Pools & Lagoons
description: Slow things down with a laidback, secluded escape to the ever-sunny Florida Keys at Hawks Cay Resort, where guests are invited to kick back and relax on the private island of Duck Key. Comfortable rooms and self-contained villas create a home-away-from-home experience, but with the number of activities available, you'll be raring to stay outside all day. Spend your time hopping between the five pools and lagoons, snorkelling in turquoise waters, spotting dolphins or paddling to neighbouring islands. Kids are spoilt for choice with specialised activities: there's a pirate ship pool with a water slide, basketball court, putt-putt golf course, resident mermaid and much more. When hunger strikes, there are six onsite dining venues to choose from, including a poolside tiki grill bar for colourful cocktails and fresh salads.
offer_address: 61 Hawks Cay Blvd, Duck Key, FL 33050, United States

title: Tropical Miami Escape near South Beach with Rooftop Pool, Bar & Restaurants
description: Steps away from the vibrant shoreline of Miami Beach, find a comforting space to rest and relax at Kimpton Angler's South Beach, an IHG Hotel. Bask in panoramic views at the rooftop pool, indulge in tailored treatments at the tranquil in-house spa, or sip the day away with a herb-infused craft gin cocktail at the ultra-cool Minnow Bar. Nourish your body with a fresh seafood feast at the delectable Seawell Fish N’ Oyster, or nibble on one of the chef’s small bites poolside at Always June.
location_description: Kimpton Angler's South Beach, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 660 Washington Ave, Miami Beach, Florida 33139, United States

title: Sun-Kissed Bay Harbor Islands Miami Retreat with Rooftop Pool
description:
Glorious gold-sand beaches and dazzling ocean-kissed coastlines await when you escape to The Altair Bay Harbor Hotel - a boutique retreat perfectly positioned in the heart of the stunning Bay Harbor Islands, Miami, Florida. Lean into the best of Miami vacation living with a stay in a bright room or spacious suite, furnished with a modern coastal beach aesthetic.

The Altair Bay Harbor Hotel is nestled moments from Bal Harbor Beach and Surfside, surrounded by chic cafés, alfresco dining, high-end fashion houses and an unmissable nightlife scene. A complimentary shuttle takes you to The Altair Beach Club at the world-famous Miami Beach, perfect for listening to the sound of the waves or strolling along the sand. Onsite, an impeccable list of facilities will keep you entertained, including an expansive rooftop terrace with a pool, a gymnasium and a soon-to-be-opened kosher restaurant.
offer_address: 9540 W Bay Harbor Dr, Bay Harbor Islands, FL 33154, United States

vendor_name: Kimpton Shorebreak Fort Lauderdale Beach Resort
title: Fort Lauderdale Beach Escape with Rooftop Pool
description: Experience a moment of zen at Kimpton Shorebreak Fort Lauderdale Beach Resort, an uber-chic stay just steps from the beach. Walk along miles of pristine beach or discover endless after-hours fun in the vibrant downtown, then retire between adventures to this modern coastal retreat. Look over the glittering ocean from the rooftop, take a tipple poolside in the courtyard, and delve into modern, laidback Italian fare at La Fuga restaurant.
location_description: Kimpton Shorebreak Fort Lauderdale Beach Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2900 Riomar Street, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33304, United States

title: Elegant Wellness Sanctuary in the Heart of Orlando Walt Disney World® Theme Parks
description: Wellness meets childlike wonder at the luxurious ette Hotel Orlando, located in the heart of Florida’s Walt Disney World® Theme Parks. The timeless elegance of the resort exudes a sense of tranquil splendour, with the lavish SPA AT THE ette offering a wisdom-filled guide to wellness and rejuvenating pampering. Take to the skies with a fashionably trendy meal at Lipa Rooftop restaurant, where the freshness of the delicate Asian artistry sits perfectly against the breathtaking vistas.
offer_address: 3001 Sherberth Road, Kissimmee, Florida 34747, United States

title: Palm Beach Top-Rated Heritage Escape near Fashionable Worth Avenue
description:
Experience the glitz and glamour of one of Florida’s most affluent cities with a stay at The Chesterfield Palm Beach, ranked among the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. This heritage hotel has been an iconic city landmark since it was established in 1926 - its interiors ooze old-world charm across the chic rooms and suites, glass chandeliers and lavish wallpaper. Be sure to head to the sultry onsite Leopard Lounge, where you can enjoy live music every night alongside dinner and handcrafted cocktails. There's no shortage of entertainment with access to the in-house cinema, digital media library, wellness centre and swimming pool.

Spend your days swimming in the outdoor pool before wandering the surrounding palm-lined boulevards, passing elegant villas and boutique properties on your way to the white sandy shores of Palm Beach. If you’re in need of some retail therapy, Worth Avenue is an easy five-minute walk away: enjoy a spot of shopping or stop for a drink at the popular cafés and restaurants that dot the city’s main street.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages):**

- Wake up to a delicious **daily breakfast** each morning
- Celebrate your escape with a **welcome drink** each
- Stay refreshed with **daily bottled still or sparkling water** supplied
- Stay connected with **complimentary Wi-Fi** available throughout the hotel
- Return to an immaculate room every evening thanks to **daily turndown service**

**Executive Suite Upgrade**: Enjoy room to move in this spacious suite, which boasts a sleek marble bathroom, separate lounge area and stylish bedroom with plush king bed.
offer_address: 363 Cocoanut Row, Palm Beach, FL 33480, United States

title: Beachfront Florida Resort Stay near Everglades National Park
description: The warm climate, glorious golden beaches and sapphire waters of Florida’s Gulf Coast beckon - and you are invited to stay at the luxurious Naples Grande Beach Resort. This breathtaking, 23-acre beachfront resort offers a delightful taste of what southern elegance in a lush tropical setting. Couples will love the resort’s modern rooms and stylish spa, while families can make the most of the resort facilities, including three outdoor pools, a thrilling waterslide and private beach. If you can tear yourself away from the exceptional restaurants and bars, 18-hole championship golf course and tournament-grade tennis courts, you'll find yourself perfectly located to explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Everglades National Park, a Florida icon, and perhaps spot some of its resident alligators and manatees.
offer_address: 475 Seagate Drive, Naples, Florida 34103, United States

title: Chic Coastal Florida Retreat with Golf Club, Day Spa & Top-Tier Dining
description: A sophisticated seasidfe sojourn awaits at The Seagate Hotel & Spa, the only resort in Delray Beach, Florida, offering exclusive access to a pristine private beach. This luxury retreat claims a prime position just steps from the sparkling shoreline and the vibrant Atlantic Avenue, brimming with eclectic boutiques, art galleries, and gourmet dining. Practice your swing at the resort's manicured 18-hole golf course, enjoy a lively game of tennis on the Har-Tru courts, or splash around in the saltwater swimming pool at the nautically decorated beach club. When you're ready to relax, retreat to your private coastal haven, unwind in the world-class spa with a massage, skin or body treatment, or sip cocktails by the pool, or take advantage of the aquatic interiors and exceptionally delicious menu of Atlantic Grille.
offer_address: 1000 East Atlantic Avenue, Delray Beach, Florida 33483, United States

title: Miami Beach Boutique Art Deco Glamour with Rooftop Pool & Bar
description:
Stay in the heart of Miami Beach’s buzzing cultural and culinary scene at KAYAK Miami Beach, a heritage Art Deco landmark turned modern boutique hotel. Fabulous facilities include a sun-soaked rooftop pool fringed by lush greenery and sun loungers, so you can sip on a cocktail while catching some rays. Dine at LAYLA, a modern Middle Eastern restaurant and elegant rooftop bar, where you can enjoy specialty cocktails, a selection of mezze and music.

The hotel sits in a secluded spot just shy of the bustling Collins Canal. However, you're not too far from the action: it's within easy walking distance of The Bass Museum of Art, Miami City Ballet and Miami Beach Botanical Garden. For a spot of nightlife, take a short cab ride to vibrant South Beach and visit its many bars and celebrity-chef restaurants, while Mid Beach is your go-to for a more tranquil day by the sea.
offer_address: 2216 Park Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, United States

title: Sun-Kissed Florida Gulf Coast Resort Stay
description:
The warm climate, glorious white-sand beaches and emerald waters of Florida’s Gulf Coast beckon - and you are invited to stay in the heart of the action at Hotel Effie, a luxurious resort in Miramar Beach. This breathtaking, 250-room resort offers a delightful taste of what southern elegance really looks and feels like. Couples will love the resort’s modern rooms, while families can make the most of the surrounding facilities and private beach. Hotel Effie offers endless reasons to never want to leave, thanks to the exceptional restaurants and bars, the only rooftop pool on Florida’s Emerald Coast, fitness centre featuring a Peleton Bike, luxury spa, lobby bar and ballroom - not to mention the access to kilometres of white-sand beaches, four championship golf courses, 15 world-class tennis courts and more.

If a dose of retail therapy is on the cards throughout your stay, be sure to visit the nearby Silver Sands Premium Outlets and Destin Commons. For those wanting to be surrounded by the area’s natural beauty, a visit to Henderson Beach State Park or Santa Rosa Beach is a must to complete your experience.
offer_address: 1 Grand Sandestin Blvd Miramar Beach FL 32550 United States

title: Activity-Packed Florida Escape near Disney World with Ten Restaurants & Two Championship Golf Courses
description:
Entertainment and activities for all ages are aplenty at this upscale Orlando retreat spread across 800 acres of lush palms and sparkling waterways. With two championship golf courses and a sports field complex you can enjoy tennis, basketball, golf and more, while a luxe spa and two shimmering pools allow for ultimate relaxation.

Sample an endless range of dining and drinking options with ten onsite bars and restaurants before venturing just a short drive from the resort to experience the magic of Walt Disney World or Universal Studios with the little ones.
offer_address: 1500 Masters Boulevard, ChampionsGate, Florida 33896, United States
